attributes.action: Flood the Channel Tunnel in order to stop the Criminal Migrants coming here.
attributes.additional_details: The criminals have shown that they care nothing for the rule of law, they care nothing for borders and they care nothing for us. They will use the same violence against us as they have against each other. We are the most populated country in Europe, let the bigger countries take these criminals if they wish. But don't bring them here. We already pay through the nose for that abomination known as the Department of International Development. We must not pay even more taxes to keep these criminals.
attributes.background: There are thousands upon thousands of criminal migrants trying to get here from Calais. There are even more thousands coming from other countries heading towards us to join them. How else can we stop 60 70 or even 90 thousand criminals from forcing their way through the Tunnel? We need to flood it.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105337

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
